question: What is the value of woodwares exported from India during the previous year?
explanation: During the year 2018-19, the exports of various segments like woodwares at US$ 719.48 million, embroidered & crochetted goods at US$ 549.1 million, misc. handicrafts at US$ 969.8 million, handprinted textiles & scarves at US$ 329.34 million, imitation jewellery at US$ 210.6 million and artmetal wares at US$ 444.41 million.
